Name: Linear Programming
Description: Optimizing a linear objective function subject to linear equality/inequality constraints.Polynomial Time

Name: Integer Programming
Description: Optimization where some variables are constrained to be integers.NP-Hard

Name: Quadratic Programming
Description: Optimizing quadratic objectives with linear constraints.NP-Hard (if non-convex)

Name: Dynamic Programming
Description: Stage-wise optimization with overlapping subproblems.Polynomial Time (for structured cases)

Name: Global Optimization
Description: Finding the absolute best solution in non-convex spaces.NP-Hard
